static member StartTimer : Microsoft.Maui.Dispatching.IDispatcher * TimeSpan * Func<bool> -> unit

Docs.param: The instance this method is called on.
Sets the amount of time between timer ticks.
The callback on which the dispatcher returns when the event is dispatched. If the result of the callback is , the timer will repeat, otherwise the timer stops.
Docs.summary: Starts a timer on the specified context.
